register.reg_long_name: Counter-timer Secure Physical Timer CompareValue Register (EL2)
register.reg_condition: when EL2 is implemented and FEAT_SEL2 is implemented

purpose_text.para: Holds the compare value for the Secure EL2 physical timer.

field_description.para: Holds the EL2 physical timer CompareValue.

When CNTHPS_CTL_EL2.ENABLE is 1, the timer condition is met when (CNTPCT_EL0 - CompareValue) is greater than or equal to zero. This means that CompareValue acts like a 64-bit upcounter timer. When the timer condition is met:

listitem.content: If CNTHPS_CTL_EL2.IMASK is 0, an interrupt is generated.

field_description.para: When CNTHPS_CTL_EL2.ENABLE is 0, the timer condition is not met, but CNTPCT_EL0 continues to count.
If the Generic counter is implemented at a size less than 64 bits, then this field is permitted to be implemented at the same width as the counter, and the upper bits are RES0.
The value of this field is treated as zero-extended in all counter calculations.
